scripts.relase:pacth: npm version patch -m "buildğŸ“¦: release %s" && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.relase:minor: npm version minor -m "buildğŸ“¦: release %s" && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.relase:major: npm version major -m "buildğŸ“¦: release %s" && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.relase:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "build: release %s" && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.commit: git add . && git cz && git push
